meanings.definition: A device held in the hand for transmitting or receiving telephone calls.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my handset with me to make phone calls.
meanings.sent2: She answered the call on her handset.
meanings.sent3: The handset rang just as I was about to leave the house.
meanings.sent4: The handset was like a magic talking box in her hand.
meanings.sent5: The shiny handset gleamed in the sunlight as she dialed the number.

meanings.definition: The part of a telephone that is held to the ear and mouth during conversation.
meanings.sent1: He adjusted the handset to his ear to hear better.
meanings.sent2: She spoke softly into the handset during the call.
meanings.sent3: The handset seemed to whisper secrets to the user.
meanings.sent4: The handset was a bridge connecting two distant voices.
meanings.sent5: The old handset crackled with static as she listened intently.
